forum.content:
I know there were no connection between us anymore. However, I still miss u a lot.
The more I want to forgot
The more I remembered
we had lots of good times and good memories ...The way you talk, you smile, you walk....still stick in my head, like it was yesterday and that drives me Crz ...
ur everything hv etched deeply in my heart. There will always be a part of u inside my head
But There's no way we can go back.
Only can look forward...
Just want you to know that
I really want you to be happy
Hope everything is well
take a good care of yourself
And to me too

To our love
forum.title: A voice in my head
